title: Amtrak Traditional Dining
description: Most long-distance trains include a Dining car serving breakfast, lunch and dinner.
cleaned_text: Traditional Dining As an exclusive, complimentary offering for customers traveling in First Class [private rooms](/onboard/onboard-accommodations-for-all-your-needs/sleeper-car-accommodations.html), traditional dining service is provided in the Dining Car on the Auto Train, California Zephyr, Coast Starlight, Empire Builder Silver Meteor, Silver Star, Southwest Chief, Sunset Limited and Texas Eagle (between San Antonio and Los Angeles). Traditional dining features seasonal menus with a variety of entree selections. Complement your meal with a wide selection of beverages, including beer, wine, spirits (the first one is on us). Be sure to leave room for dessert — there's something to satisfy every sweet tooth. In addition to our regular menu, kids can order all their favorites onboard. [Café service](/onboard/meals-dining/cafe-car.html) is also available to all customers along these routes, offering a variety of meals, snacks and beverages for sale. Auto Train - Chef-prepared dinner with table service in the Dining Car - Selections for the kids - First alcoholic drink at dinner on us - A continental breakfast served prior to arrival - Complimentary room service Western Routes - Chef-prepared meals for breakfast, lunch and a three course dinner - Selections for the kids - An array of appetizers with dinner — and the first alcoholic drink is on us - Table service in the Dining Car with glassware, cutlery and white linen tablecloths - Complimentary room service Silver Star & Silver Meteor - Chef-prepared meals for breakfast, lunch and dinner - Selections for the kids - First alcoholic drink at dinner on us - Table service in the Dining Car with glassware, cutlery and white linen tablecloths - Complimentary room service Sample Menus Get a taste of traditional dining selections by sampling each route menu: Sample Menus Get a taste of traditional dining selections by sampling each route menu: Our menus are updated regularly, so selections and prices are subject to change. *Service between San Antonio and Los Angeles only. See the [flexible dining menu](/onboard/meals-dining/flexible-dining.html) for service between Chicago and San Antonio. A Few Sample Dishes from Our New Menu Oven Roasted Atlantic Salmon Rigatoni Bolognese White Chocolate Blueberry Cobbler Cheesecake Making Reservations Customers on routes with traditional dining service can make reservations for lunch and dinner — served in the Dining Car or by complimentary in-room service. Meal Times Breakfast: Available 6:30 - 9:30 am Lunch: Available 11:30 am - 2:30 pm Dinner: Available: 5:00 - 9:00 pm Final seatings at 9:30 am, 2:30 pm, 9:00 pm respectively. A 'last call' is made 15 minutes before period ends. Exceptions may apply based on train schedule or in the event of a delay. Amtrak Guest Rewards Forgot Password? Passwords are case sensitive, should be at least 10 characters long and should include 1 uppercase and 1 lowercase alpha character, 1 number and 1 special character. ! " # $ % & ' ( ) * + , - . / : ; < = > ? @ [ \ ] ^ _ ` < | > ~ Enter the email address or member number associated with your account. We will send password reset instructions. An email with password reset instructions is on the way. That answer wasn't correct either. We've sent you an email with instructions to reset your password instead.
